page.title: 10JOHN DEERE
page.content: Founded in 1837 by a blacksmith,{John {Deere}is now a world wide company with its headquarters in Moline,U.S.A The sales branch was opened in { {(1966) }at Langar, because it was in the heart of England. It now employs { {116}people{(40 ladies,76 men) }making tractors and combine harvesters. Many local farmers use their machinery. It also runs a repair service. The company has factories in U.S.A. {(9)}Canada{(1),}Mexico {(1),}Argentina {(1),}WestGermany{(2),}France {(3) Spain {(1),}South Africa{(1),} Britain {(1)}. Sales branches are also found in Sweden and Italy. The company vehicle colours are green and yellow ,with a deere as an emblem.
